title: 'PRIMAL' Series  by Jack Silkstone (Books 1-4)

About the Author: 

    Jack Silkstone grew up on a steady diet of Tom Clancy, James Bond, Jason Bourne, Commando comics, & the original first-person shooters, Wolfenstein and Doom. His background includes a career in military intelligence & special operations, working alongside some of the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most elite units. His love of action-adventure stories, his military background, & his real world experiences combined to inspire the no-holds-barred 'PRIMAL' series, including "PRIMAL Origin", "PRIMAL Unleashed", "PRIMAL Vengeance", & "PRIMAL Fury".
